Launching teleconsultation in France

Client
Livi

Livi is a medical teleconsultation platform that allows patients to consult general practitioners and specialists online, 7 days a week and 24 hours a day.

Rôle
Head of Design

I led the design team and defined the UX strategy to launch medical teleconsultation in France, creating a coherent and accessible design system.

Impact
Strong growth, design industrialization.

Under my leadership, Livi became the leader in teleconsultation in France with more than 2 million users. I industrialized design with a reusable component system that accelerated the development of new features.
